work_experience.responsibilities: Developed consistent technical training to ensure skill attainment across seven manufacturing sites in the region.

Established and led a regional safety and health network for multiple sites across the US. Expanded safety auditing responsibilities, led incident-free operations, became an internal ISO 22000 and ISO 14001 auditor, and supported transition for newly acquired businesses. Led HR, training, and safety for 600+ workers, negotiated union contracts, and implemented behavior-based safety improvements.
Managed HR operations, succession planning, and employee engagement for industrial sites. Partnered with management teams on safety, performance management, and recruitment initiatives.

Led HR and training functions across multiple states, managed site transitions, defeated union campaigns, implemented crisis management and workforce training programs, and secured state workforce development grants.
Oversaw HR, quality operations, and process improvement. Reduced operational errors by 83%, implemented performance management processes, and coordinated plant closure activities.
Managed HR, training, safety, and labor relations. Negotiated UAW contracts, reduced absenteeism and compensation costs, closed grievances, and improved workforce productivity.
Oversaw HR functions for multi-plant operations, managed safety and training, implemented first HRIS system, and received multiple promotions and company awards.
